Package DBAccess

Class DBAppointments

  • java.lang.Object
    • DBAccess.DBAppointments
  • public class DBAppointments
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods that connect to the database and run SQL code for appointments.

        public static void addAppointment​(java.lang.String title,

                                  java.sql.Timestamp end,
                                  int customerID,
                                  int userID,
                                  int contactID)
        Method that runs SQL on the database to add a new appointment to the appointment table.
        Parameters:
        title - Title for the appointment
        description - Description for the appointment
        location - Location for the appointment
        type - Type of appointment
        start - Start date and time of the appointment
        end - End date and time of the appointment
        customerID - CustomerID for the appointment
        userID - UserID for the appointment
        contactID - ContactID for the appointment
